bilingual.source: This is my personal assistant, Mr. Grin.
bilingual.target: 这是我的私人助理，格林先生。

bilingual.source: The new assistant impressed the boss with his creative proposal for solving the company's problems.
bilingual.target: 新助理用他解决公司问题的创意提案给老板留下了深刻印象。
他是一名新来的助理工程师。

bilingual.source: He asked the assistant to Xerox the contract.
This store is hiring a sales assistant.
bilingual.target: 这家店正在招聘销售助理。

bilingual.source: She dictated the letter to her assistant.
bilingual.target: 她口述了信件给她的助理。

bilingual.source: My assistant scheduled the meeting for me.
bilingual.target: 我的助理帮我安排了会议。

bilingual.source: The assistant helped me organize my schedule.
bilingual.target: 助理帮我整理了日程安排。

list.abstract: assistant（英 [əˈsɪstənt]，美 [əˈsɪstənt]），英语单词。作名词为助理；助手；帮手。例句：At first, the viral assistant wasn't too great（起初，虚拟助手反响并不太好）。 作名词时，近义词有friend，aid，mate。作形容词时，近义词有helpful，useful，aided。

yingyinNormal.en: Chandler, you have an assistant right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德，你有助理吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, I'm here about the assistant job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来面试助理的工作。真的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Where you can make out with your assistant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且可以在办公室跟助理鬼混。

yingyinNormal.en: But you're the assistant mayor of Zootopia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你可是动物城的市长助理啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Assistant Mayor Bellwether, her badge. Oh, yes, yes! Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 头羊市长助理，她的警徽。对了！谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I think I could do a good job as your assistant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，我可以做你的助理。

yingyinNormal.en: What's going on? Sheldon's assistant asked me on a date last night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？谢尔顿的助理昨晚约我。

yingyinNormal.en: Your assistant is totally hitting on this jerk and he loves it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的助理明摆着对他有意思，他还暗爽。

yingyinNormal.en: How would you feel about taking out my assistant Tag? I'll pay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要不要带我的助理泰格出去玩？我付钱。

yingyinNormal.en: What's the job? Assistant buyer. I would be shopping for a living.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是什么工作？采购助理，我要用购物来谋生了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, don't start judging me. You're the one who's in love with her assistant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，别开始批评我，你爱上了你的助理。

yingyinNormal.en: How do you think this suit would look on an assistant buyer at Bloomingdale's?
yingyinNormal.zh: 布鲁明戴尔的采购助理穿上这套装如何？

yingyinNormal.en: I just heard Officer Hopps is taking the case! Assistant Mayor Bellwether!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我听说霍普斯警官接了案子！头羊市长助理！

yingyinNormal.en: How come we have one extra place setting? 'Cause you invited your assistant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么多了一套餐具？你邀了你的助理过来。

yingyinNormal.en: That's an idea. Hey, if I hired an assistant, would you take money from her?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个办法好，要是我请助理转交，你会收吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Just so we're not flying completely blind, I went ahead and bluejacked his assistant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 咱们不能像没头苍蝇乱飞，我黑了他的助理。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey Phoebe. Guess what? What? Joey just hired Chandler to be his assistant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比，你猜怎样？怎样？乔伊找钱德当他的助理。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey Mon, little question for you. How do you think this suit will look on an assistant buyer?
yingyinNormal.zh: 莫妮卡，快问快答，采购助理穿这套装如何？

yingyinNormal.en: So it's on me now? No, Art, it's on me. And the kid is the new assistant GM.
yingyinNormal.zh: 都是我的问题吗？不，阿尔特，是我的问题，还有那小子是我的新助理。

yingyinNormal.en: No Joey. Chandler could be your assistant. See, he could answer all of your fan mail and stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是啦，钱德可以当你的助理，他可以帮你回信给影迷。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 助理; 店员; 助教

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 帮助；援助；补助；协助

word_family.mean: v. 帮助；协助；资助；在场

sense_info_list.en: a person who helps in particular work
sense_info_list.zh: 助理; 店员; 助教

examination_example.sentence: Students without experience can catch up after a few introductory courses, said the <highlight>assistant</highlight> dean at Carnegie Mellon's School of Computer Science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡内基梅隆大学计算机科学学院的助理院长说，没有经验的学生可以在几门入门课程后迎头赶上。

examination_example.sentence: Priestly explains how the deep blue color of the <highlight>assistant</highlight>'s sweater descended over the years from fashion shows to department stores?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Priestly解释了助手身上毛衣的深蓝色如何在几年间从时装秀屈尊到百货商店的？

examination_example.sentence: Miranda Priestly, played by Meryl Streep, scolds her unattractive <highlight>assistant</highlight> for imagining that high fashion doesn't affect her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 梅丽尔·斯特里普饰演的Miranda Priestly斥责她毫无魅力的助理，因为她认为高级时尚不会影响她。

sense_info_list.en: a person who ranks below a senior person

examination_example.sentence: Joana Lia Ferreira, an <highlight>assistant</highlight> professor of conservation and restoration at the nova School of Science and Technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 琼娜莉亚费雷拉是诺瓦科技学院的保护和修复助理教授。

examination_example.sentence: Srini Pillay is an <highlight>assistant</highlight> professor of psychiatry at Harvard Medical School.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Srini Pillay是哈佛医学院精神病学助理教授。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 帮助；协助；资助；在场

sense_info_list.en: a person who helps in particular work
sense_info_list.zh: 助手; 店员; 助教

examination_example.sentence: And this often leads to a great deal of mutual respect, whether it's with a colleague, an <highlight>assistant</highlight> or even a receptionist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是与同事、助理，甚至是接待员，这通常都会带来极大的相互尊重。

examination_example.sentence: Glenn Schellenberg's research <highlight>assistants</highlight> had no idea what he was trying to prove in his new study.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 格伦•谢伦伯格(Glenn Schellenberg)的研究助理不知道他在新研究中试图证明什么。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps, if we continue to improve information-processing machines, we'll soon have helpful rational <highlight>assistants</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们不断完善机器处理信息的能力，用不了多久我们就可能会拥有“理性的”得力助手。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 帮助；援助；补助；协助

word_family.mean: v. 帮助；协助；资助；在场

sense_info_list.en: a person who helps in particular work
sense_info_list.zh: 助手; 店员; 助教

examination_example.sentence: At first, the viral <highlight>assistant</highlight> wasn't too great.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 起初，虚拟助手反响并不太好。

examination_example.sentence: Professor Godel already had eight teaching <highlight>assistants</highlight>, but that wasn't enough to deal with the overwhelming number of daily questions from students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戈德尔教授已经有了八名助教，但这还不足以应付学生们每天提出的大量问题。

examination_example.sentence: Professor Godel DEC died to do something to remedy this situation and his solution was to create a virtual <highlight>assistant</highlight> named Ll Watson, which is based on the IBM Watson platform.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戈德尔教授决定做些事情来补救这种情况，他的解决方案是在IBM沃森平台的基础上创建一个名为吉尔·沃森的虚拟助手。

examination_example.sentence: Professor Shook Godel of Georgia Tech developed an sacrificially intelligent teaching <highlight>assistant</highlight> to help handle enormous number of student questions in the online class, Knowledge Based Artificial Intelligence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 佐治亚理工学院的肖克·戈德尔教授开发了一种人工智能教学助手，来帮助处理“基于人工智能的知识”这门网课中大量的学生提问。

examination_example.sentence: The goal of Professor Godel's virtual <highlight>assistant</highlight> next year is to take over answering 40% of all the questions posed by students on the online forum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戈德尔教授的虚拟助手明年的目标是回答学生在在线论坛上提出的所有问题的40%。

examination_example.sentence: The students, who were studying artificial intelligence, were interacting with the virtual <highlight>assistant</highlight> and couldn't tell it apart om a real human being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学习人工智能的学生们与虚拟助手互动，并不知道她不是真人。

examination_example.sentence: The vital <highlight>assistant</highlight> became so advanced and realistic that the students didn't know she was a computer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虚拟助手变得十分先进和逼真，以至于学生们都不知道她其实是一台电脑。

sense_info_list.en: a person who ranks below a senior person

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>assistant</highlight> professor in the teacher education department of the Borough of Manhattan Community College.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 曼哈顿社区学院教师教育系的一名助理教授。

examination_example.sentence: The former head of the UNESCO World Heritage Centre, which oversees heritage sites, is Francesco Bandarin, a Venetian who now serves as UNESCO's <highlight>assistant</highlight> director-general for culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 联合国教科文组织世界遗产中心(UNESCO World Heritage Centre)前负责人 Francesco Bandarin 是威尼斯人，现担任联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)文化事务助理总干事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 帮助；援助；补助；协助

word_family.mean: v. 帮助；协助；资助；在场

sense_info_list.en: a person who helps in particular work
sense_info_list.zh: 助手; 店员; 助教

examination_example.sentence: I've been offered a job for three years as an <highlight>assistant</highlight> to Prof. Hayes from Birmingham University.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我得到一份伯明翰大学海因斯教授助理的工作，为期三年。

examination_example.sentence: I'm the teaching <highlight>assistant</highlight> for this lab session.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我是这次实验的助教。

examination_example.sentence: His presence meant that I had an unexpected teaching <highlight>assistant</highlight> in class whose creativity would infect (感染) other students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的存在意味着我有了一个意料之外的教学助理，他的创作力会感染其他的学生。

examination_example.sentence: By volunteering as a summer reading <highlight>assistant</highlight> for kids, I got an idea of who I wanted to become.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过志愿为孩子们做暑期阅读助手，我知道了自己想成为什么样的人。

examination_example.sentence: We’re looking for Saturday <highlight>assistants</highlight> (帮手) in our busy town centre restaurant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们繁忙的市中心餐馆正在招周六助理。

examination_example.sentence: I would be the person doing the repair and Mike my <highlight>assistant</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我是修理的人，迈克是我的助手。
